feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three UI behavior features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing key frontend files, animations, layout, and evasive button logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling view states and proximity-based evasive No button with collision checks and heart effects.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationHeart: Generates continuous floating heart animations using timed state updates.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Renders 8-heart radial burst effect at a given position with staggered animation.
Centered card layout wrapper with blurred background, rounded corners, and padding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor, refreshing on identity changes using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and persistent login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom heart-themed animations plus background pattern styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s metadata, version, and a list of implemented features describing the ICP backend, themed frontend, and interaction behavior.
